item.description: We are pleased to welcome Mick Quinn, founder of the Integral Heart Foundation and author of The Uncommon Path, for a dialogue around service, care, and activism through the Integral lens.  In the absolute, everything is perfect as it is, and yet in the relative we can witness all the problems and suffering this world holds as part of our cosmic evolutionary process.  As a community of individuals who share the values for Integral consciousness, we are always trying to balance our interior exploration of self and culture with our exterior engagement in form.  Since spirit permeates in the world of form also, we are often confronted with the notion of what can we do in the service of those in need for the sake of something higher.  This evening will include an interview with our speaker around this theme, a presentation of the work being done by the Integral Heart Foundation in Guatemala, and a Q&A with the audience. (Please note: This event is a fundraiser and all proceeds will go to the Integral Heart Foundation.)
item.name: Integral Service with Mick Quinn: Healing the Wounds of the Evolutionary Process
